channel.title: Privacy on Ink Mortar
channel.description: Recent content in Privacy on Ink Mortar

item.title: I could become you tomorrow and no one will know
item.description: Backstory I lied, but maybe someone else could. If you didn’t know already, Malaysia just suffered possibly its largest data breach ever with personal data of millions of Malaysians (including your full name, IC number, phone number and home address) up for grabs as long as the price is right. If you are not freaked out yet, you should be and I’ll tell you why. I don’t think many people understand how dangerous these data can be.
